name: Run out of Chaos
description:
In this little game you must run out of chaos. But chaos is everywhere so be prepared for unexpected twists of fate.

Your mission it is run out of Chaos Death wall far as possible. To do this you can run, jump, double jump and wall jump. Your health not unlimited, beware the spikes, death wall and abysses. 

Event (CHAOS) what you can see at the game : 

  • "learn to walk... again.." (move control buttons is change)
  • "antigravity" (world is rotate by 180 degrees)
  • "space is not constant" (camera perspective and angle is changing)
  • "space is not constant absolutely" (YOU CAN RUN ON THE WALL movement control changing to WASD)
  • "Lets Disco" (Color filter)
  • "take a different look" (Your vision is rotate by 90 degrees)
  • "Close the eyes" (ypu see very small area)

Control button is simple :

  • Key arrow (<-   ->) for run left\right 
  • Space for jump and double jump.

BUT, be careful, because i heard the chaos can change your buttons.

In menu you can control buttons with up\down arrows and Enter, also you can do it with mouse. In game you can pause it (Escape). (In End game menu use mouse, i cant fix the bug and game crash if you use keyboard for chose button). In Option you can edit music volume and chose the difficulty (for open Legendary difficulty you ned to reach 500 scores and after this click the button in options)

Try to beat my record 2000 scores on legendary difficulty!

By the way it my first game jam and it was great experience. I try make devlog in tiktok and you can watch it https://www.tiktok.com/@cool_inar. 

All assets from AssetStore unity.

Music from https://indiegamemusic.com/
